title: DDEV config 1.19
description: Schema for DDEV config for version 1.19

name.description: Provide the name of the project to configure (normally the same as the last part of directory name)

docroot.description: Provide the relative docroot of the project, like 'docroot' or 'htdocs' or 'web', defaults to empty, the current directory

php_version.description: The version of PHP that will be enabled in the web container

webserver_type.description: Sets the project's desired webserver type

router_http_port.description: The router HTTP port for this project

router_https_port.description: The router HTTPS port for this project

xdebug_enabled.description: Whether or not XDebug is enabled in the web container

additional_hostnames.description: A comma-delimited list of hostnames for the project

additional_fqdns.description: A comma-delimited list of FQDNs for the project

database.description: Specify the database type and version to use. Defaults to mariadb:10.3

type.description: Specify the database type to use

version.description: Specify the database version to use

nfs_mount_enabled.description: Enable NFS mounting of project in container

mutagen_enabled.description: Enable mutagen asynchronous update of project in web container

use_dns_when_possible.description: Use DNS for hostname resolution instead of /etc/hosts when possible

composer_version.description: Specify override for composer version in web container. This may be "", "1", "2", or a specific version

nodejs_version.description: Specify the nodejs version to use if you don't want the default NodeJS 16

web_environment.description: Add environment variables to web container

bind_all_interfaces.description: Bind host ports on all interfaces, not just on localhost network interface

dbimage_extra_packages.description: A list of Debian packages that should be added to db container when the project is started

xhprof_enabled.description: Enable xhprof in the web container

timezone.description: Specify timezone for containers and php

upload_dir.description: Sets the project's upload directory, the destination directory of the import-files command

working_dir.description: Override default project working directories for db and web service

web.description: Overrides the default working directory for the web service

db.description: Overrides the default working directory for the db service

omit_containers.description: A list of container types that should not be started when the project is started

fail_on_hook_fail.description: Decide whether 'ddev start' should be interrupted by a failing hook

host_https_port.description: The web container's localhost-bound https port

phpmyadmin_port.description: Router port to be used for PHPMyAdmin (dba) container access

phpmyadmin_https_port.description: Router port to be used for PHPMyAdmin (dba) container access (https)

host_phpmyadmin_port.description: The dba (PHPMyAdmin) container's localhost-bound port, if exposed via bind-all-interfaces

mailhog_port.description: Router port to be used for mailhog access

mailhog_https_port.description: Router port to be used for mailhog access (https)

host_mailhog_port.description: The mailhog container's localhost-bound port, if exposed via bind-all-interfaces

webimage_extra_packages.description: A list of Debian packages that should be added to web container when the project is started

project_tld.description: Set the top-level domain to be used for projects, defaults to ddev.site (default "ddev.site")

ngrok_args.description: Provide extra args to ngrok in ddev share

disable_settings_management.description: Prevent ddev from creating or updating CMS settings files

no_project_mount.description: Whether or not to skip mounting project code into the web container

hooks.description: Run tasks before or after main DDEV commands are executed
